## tooling-data-overlay package

Helper function to generate a data overlay

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [generateDataOverlay(aSrcDirOrPkg, aDstDir)](./tooling-data-overlay.generatedataoverlay.md) | Overlays all transitively referenced packages and copies then into a target folder |
